title:u/pandapaxxy's Deep Stone Crypt weapons breakdown, Controller edition
description:Originally found at https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/k10oxg/deep_stone_crypt_controller/


// Heritage
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvE): "For PvE I don’t think it will beat First In, Last Out if you wanted a quick answer. For a longer answer you’re going to want fluted barrel for a faster handling shotgun. Reconstruction is the new perk here. [...] Combine that with the new recombination that gives Heritage a damage bonus when you kill enemies with your energy weapon (up to 1.5x) means you get a pocket Izanagi’s Burden. [...] I could see recombination breaking the game a bit" Recommended MW - Reload.|tags:controller,pve

// Heritage
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvP): "In PvP without Quickdraw you're really missing a ton. Gunnora's Axe and Blasphemer both got sunset but have better perk pools for PvP. Opening shot is really nice to have but not a must. Quickdraw is. You can certainly make a "Quickdraw" feel with high handling. You won't need to increase the range because Heritage is over the 65 range cap of slugs. A let down for a good slug replacement." Recommended MW - Handling.|tags:controller,pvp
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=1840239774,791862061,3161816588,957782887
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=4090651448,791862061,3161816588,957782887
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=1840239774,106909392,3161816588,957782887
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=4090651448,106909392,3161816588,957782887
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=1840239774,791862061,3161816588,588594999
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=4090651448,791862061,3161816588,588594999
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=1840239774,106909392,3161816588,588594999
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=4090651448,106909392,3161816588,588594999
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=1840239774,791862061,3161816588,2450788523
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=4090651448,791862061,3161816588,2450788523
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=1840239774,106909392,3161816588,2450788523
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=4090651448,106909392,3161816588,2450788523


// Succession
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvE): "Unfortunately it handles like a brick and the only way to make that better is to heavily invest in handling. Fluted Barrel is almost the only option for it to be competitive like Bite of the Fox and with a worse perk pool (no opening shot, no kill clip) it is essentially a slightly better but also slightly worse Long Walk. No quickdraw I think really hurts this sniper. [...] the only roll to really keep an eye out for is reconstruction and vorpal weapon. Beef up the magazine and let reconstruction take the wheel. Vorpal weapon with that beefier magazine can let you really lay into those bosses." Recommended MW - Reload.|tags:controller,pve
dimwishlist:item=2990047042&perks=1840239774,106909392,1523832109,1546637391

// Succession
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvP): "Unfortunately it handles like a brick and the only way to make that better is to heavily invest in handling. Fluted Barrel is almost the only option for it to be competitive like Bite of the Fox and with a worse perk pool (no opening shot, no kill clip) it is essentially a slightly better but also slightly worse Long Walk. No quickdraw I think really hurts this sniper." Recommended MW - Handling.|tags:controller,pvp
dimwishlist:item=2990047042&perks=1840239774,3142289711,2039302152,957782887

dimwishlist:item=2990047042&perks=1840239774,106909392,2450788523,1546637391


// Posterity
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvE): "180s have not really been meta since the howl twins and that was definitely an exception. For PvE I find their damage per shot to be really poor and the lower mag on Posterity compared to something like Malfeasance doesn’t do it justice. Rapid hit and rampage are certainly the go to and reconstruction while neat won’t really work on a weapon you’re going to want to use more often." Recommended MW - Reload.|tags:controller,pve
dimwishlist:item=3281285075&perks=1840239774,106909392,247725512,3425386926

// Posterity
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvP): "For PvP they have a 1 second flat ttk. While their ease of use and recoil are easy to manage so is Luna’s Howl and that has the same ttk as Ace of Spades or any of the now 140 hand cannons. The 1.0s flat is just a tad too slow compared to any of the meta hand cannons." Recommended MW - Stability.|tags:controller,pvp

// Trustee
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvE): "For PvE they have a high hill to climb. Reconstruction is interesting and does allow for a more hybrid weapon between smgs and their weakness: range. But having that slow build up to double is kind of a downer. Wellspring for general ability buffs off of your cooldowns is really neat and allows you to really lean into abilities." Recommended MW - Reload.|tags:controller,pve
dimwishlist:item=1392919471&perks=1840239774,106909392,1523832109,2213355989
dimwishlist:item=1392919471&perks=839105230,106909392,1523832109,2213355989

// Commemoration
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvE): "For PvE the easy answer is feeding frenzy and rampage. Tried and true from Hammerhead. But another option is Reconstruction and dragonfly. Dragonfly was exclusive to this season’s Thermal Erosion but on an adaptive frame machine gun means getting dragonfly to proc is far easier. Reconstruction coupled with a mag extension can mean you can use Commemoration as your primary. Throw in machine gun finders and weapons with lead from gold and you won’t need a primary." Recommended MW - Reload.|tags:controller,pve

// Commemoration
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvP): "For PvP you’re going to want a mix of stability and range. Smallbore provides just that. The best benefit from your mag and masterwork comes in the form of a stability masterwork and accurized rounds. Dynamic sway reduction since the buff is the best choice for increasing your accuracy. Since we don’t have quickdraw that means surplus can give us a very close feel. Granted you need to have all three of your abilities up to have the best buff it can still give you enough handling to be noticeable." Recommended MW - Stability.|tags:controller,pvp
